actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a Federal moratorium on drilling operations in a portion of the Outer Continental Shelf in the Santa Barbara Channel pending the ability to control and prevent pollution by oil discharges and to improve the state of the art with respect to oil production from the submerged lands, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for a Federal moratorium on drilling operations in a portion of the Outer Continental Shelf in the Santa Barbara Channel pending the ability to control and prevent pollution by oil discharges and to improve the state of the art with respect to oil production from the submerged lands.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a Federal moratorium on drilling operations in a portion of the Outer Continental Shelf in the Santa Barbara Channel pending the ability to control and prevent pollution by oil discharges and to improve the state of the art with respect to oil production from the submerged lands, and for other purposes.
